race.name: Heathland Gravel
race.tagline: Belgian heathland—110km of Limburg gravel, 1,400m elevation, June warmth, Belgian beer.

terrain.surface: 80% gravel, 20% paved roads. Belgian heathland—rolling terrain, forest paths. 1,400 m over 110 km. Limburg area. Technical rating: 3/5.

biased_opinion.summary: Heathland Gravel is Belgian heathland—110 km, 1,400 m elevation. Founded ~2021. 80% gravel, 20% paved. Belgian heathland—rolling terrain, forest paths. 400-600 riders. Limburg, Belgium. June summer conditions (15-23°C). Affordable entry (€75-€110 / $80-$120). If you want Belgian heathland with affordable entry and Belgian beer, this is it. If you need dry weather guarantee, skip it. June rain 30%.
biased_opinion.bottom_line: Heathland Gravel is Belgian heathland forest gravel. 110 km, 1,400 m, June warmth. If you want Belgian heathland with affordable entry, this is it. If you need dry weather guarantee, skip it. Rain risk 30%. Post-race Belgian beer.

black_pill.title: INTERNATIONAL TRAVEL + JUNE RAIN (30%)
black_pill.reality: International travel to Belgium required. Brussels airport 80 km (1-hour drive). 110 km is long. 1,400 m cumulative elevation. June = 30% rain risk. 10-15% DNF. You'll pay €75-€110 ($80-$120) + international travel. If you need dry weather guarantee, this isn't it. If you want Belgian heathland with affordable entry, this is it. Rain risk manageable.
black_pill.expectation_reset: Heathland Gravel is Belgian heathland gravel. June rain 30%, 110 km. If you need dry weather guarantee, skip it. If you want Belgian heathland with affordable entry, this is it. Rain risk manageable. Post-race Belgian beer.

logistics.travel_summary: Fly to Brussels (BRU). Rental car or train (80 km, 1-hour drive to Limburg). Region lodging—book early. Day-before packet pickup. Race June. Post-race Belgian beer.
logistics.food_options: Aid stations on course. Post-race party with Belgian beer.
